feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:36 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
